Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28757 affecting package expat for versions less than 2.6.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28757 affecting package expat for versions less than 2.6.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package expat is earlier than 2.6.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-28757
